pull.title: Testnet reset
pull.body:
Changes:
- New genesis block
- Checkpoint at block 546
- Blocks <546 contain lots of interesting test cases (blockchain uploaded to https://github.com/downloads/bitcoin/bitcoin/testnet3.zip )
- testnet IRC channel for bootstrapping changed to #bitcoinTEST3
- testnet database subdirectory changed to testnet3/

I'll try to keep a couple of listening nodes running to serve up the new blockchain, and will switch over the testnet faucet when this is pulled.

repo.name: bitcoin-git
repo.description: Feature branches that aren't yet, or never will be, ready for mainline bitcoin

events.message: Fix issue#1082, testnet difficulty unsigned integer underflow
Add a testnet checkpoint at block 546

issue.title: Reset testnet
issue.body: Testnet should be reset for 0.7, if not 0.6.1.

issue.title: testnet difficulty algorithm integer underflow

events.body: Ive tested the heck out of this, it looks good to me.
